cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.26)

# Suppresses console messages generated by vcpkg during package detection
set(VCPKG_INSTALL_OPTIONS --no-print-usage)

project(Merlin)

find_package(SDL2 CONFIG REQUIRED)
find_package(OpenGL REQUIRED)
find_package(glad CONFIG REQUIRED)
find_package(glm CONFIG REQUIRED)
find_package(imgui CONFIG REQUIRED)

set(MERLIN_EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES_TO_LINK_WITH
    $<TARGET_NAME_IF_EXISTS:SDL2::SDL2main>
    $<IF:$<TARGET_EXISTS:SDL2::SDL2>,SDL2::SDL2,SDL2::SDL2-static>
    glad::glad
    glm::glm
    imgui::imgui
    )

set(MERLIN_VCPKG_INCLUDE_DIR "${VCPKG_INSTALLED_DIR}/${VCPKG_TARGET_TRIPLET}/include")
include_directories(${MERLIN_VCPKG_INCLUDE_DIR})

message("VCPKG includes directory = ${MERLIN_VCPKG_INCLUDE_DIR}")
message("Sources directory = ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src")

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 20)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)

add_subdirectory(./src)

message("Generating build files ...")
